name: MODS For Crazy Craft PC Edition
name_original: MODS For Crazy Craft PC Edition
description:
* * * * * CRAZY CRAFT MOD PACK IS ON 50% SALE NOW ! * * * * *

* * * TODAY ON SALE ! 50% OFF !!! * * * * *

Crazy Craft Mod finally has its own game! These mods are extremely fun ! Now you can fight with creepers ranging from 100-300 health. All normal mobs boofed beyond belief. Stronger modded bosses. This app contains the entire collection of custom mods.

If you love FNAF then you will also love the BEAR PIZZA MOD GAME that is included here!

Features:
- Complete mods & Full Games (50+ mods)
- Mod Preview Gallery
- Amazing Gameplay
- Recently viewed mods
- Universal App works for every device!
